name: modal-b

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, wn(w0)))))
-| wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))))), wn(w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, wn(w0)))))
-| wi(wn(wal(s0, wn(wal(s0, wn(w0))))), wn(w0))

comment: The analogue in our predicate calculus of the Brouwer axiom (B) of modal logic S5. (Contributed by NM, 5-Oct-2005.)
